 2024-05492024-05-24PCH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of PAUL GENEST of Toronto, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective May 26, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of PAUL GENEST of Toronto, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective May 26, 2024.
